A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The writing was just way to all over the place\, Lukes death was extremely premature and unnecessary(We all know he was going to die\, but to die this quick? Totally ridiculous imo)\, Captain Phasmas death??? ... This movie was just all over the place and I dont even know what they were going for specifically with it\, I wont be totally certain on my opinion until the next movie I guess.
